name: wolfslice
text: A comment left by wolfslice was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, DR_MANFLESH_DESIRES_ANAL_PLAY_IMMEDIATELY, nutmeg)

name: deimosrising
text: In order to fully understand the humor of this strip, you must at some point have been drunk enough to find the girls at a night school attractive. This is an epic level of drunk.

name: antsama
text: oh my god you're right.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, novacaine, the_dingle, Tibia)

name: mirzabah
text: Three people do not.

name: tibia
text: Four do not.

name: garlic_breath
text:
This strip is funny to me because even though I get drunk like most nights, I work full time and go to night school to earn college credits so I think that I'm doing alright, but then it turns out that Todd goes to night school so it just kind of reminds me that I'm not really even doing better than Todd in some ways.

There are always a few hotties in my classes. I don't know what you guys are talking about. I'm maybe reasonably attractive, but those classes never make me feel like the most beautiful. They usually make me feel pretty smart, though. But then that goes back to having to remember that I'm still just a drunk going to night school.

name: hcaz
text: Aww

name: bpmead
text: At least you know what classes you're in... right?

name: saint
text: Where I grew up you had to be drunk off your ass to find ANY of the girls even moderately attractive.

name: greenkoolayd
text: there are some hot broads in my night classes at ITT.

name: kazad
text: I love how Todd's van goes "scree!" as it brakes on the comforter...

name: abe
text: That van hasn't had a brake job since 1989.

name: epicurus
text: For some reason the first thing I pictured was a woman in a bikini rubbing the van's brakes over and over until...

name: epicurus
text: I am not proud of what I done.

name: abe
text: P.s. Todd is my spirit animal.

name: gouldgonewild
text:
This made me think of your Power Animal, like in
Thumb Suckers

name: riazm
text: Steve Buscemi is my spirit animal.

name: ambala
text: Hips will not be kept waiting!

name: robobogle
text: Todd Todd Todd Todd Todd T Squirrel is probably a liberal arts major. Hence the sexy ladies and all of the drinking.

name: sumisueme
text: It is a normal occurance for Todd T. Squirrel to be driving on the bed.

name: qwerty
text: How did he get up there? How does he get down the stairs?

name: riazm
text: How can I say he takes it off ramps without it sounding like a Napoleon D reference?

name: tekende
text: Like that. For a Napoleon Dynamite reference you must say "sweet jumps."

name: deusoma
text: I was just gonna say I picture Todd nudging a bigass ramp into position and then flooring it down the hallway. Actually, now I wanna see that.

name: rational
text: Down the stairs is not really the mystery, my friend. Pretty much anything can go down stairs.

name: arelladawn
text: You have the best avatar ever.  Thanks for existing.

name: i_love_kate
text: I think we need a handy term to describe amusing avatar/comment correlation.

name: lux
text: SFH - symbiotic-forum humorisms

name: em2
text: See my study in WebPysch monthly.

name: sje46
text: Synergy?

name: puguglypress
text: Next time I see one, I will use this term. "SFH, dude!"

name: zem
text: i will crush you

name: puguglypress
text: DUDE! SETTLE DOWN!

name: jonnay
text: I like that Todd is already hanging out the window as his car is coming to a sliding, screeching stop.

name: ovenface
text: I always thought Todd was driving a stolen meat delivery van, but I guess that's actually a window on the side and not a picture of a t-bone.

name: dybrar
text: Todd delivers meat in his own little way.

name: brynito
text: Cuss my bones, indeed.

name: mattylite
text: Hey, if you put a staff under those notes in panel one, they'd be the same as the first bar of Todd's open mic tune. In this present strip I wonder if a.) it was him singing, b.) he played it on his car stereo, or, hopefully, c.) it is the custom-made horn on his van. Please don't point out that the horn goes beep-beep in panel 5. Wait... OH GOD WHAT IS PRESSING THE HORN IN PANEL 5

name: snowman
text: That's his pager - he's got hips to serve.

name: mattylite
text: Man, I was too busy gettin' rough chuckles from imagining Todd's wang BEEP BEEPing the horn to put that together...

name: hamscout
text: Sounds like you haven't had a brake job since 1989...

name: dovey
text: Hooray, now I know where my AssetBar gender assignment comes from!

name: sje46
text:
HIPSERVER!!!
I get it now

name: woodenteeth
text: I love that Todd smacks the horn with his... ummm... foot when he's talkin up the tight broads *BEEP BEEP*

name: i_love_kate
text: That's his pager, etc.

name: woodenteeth
text: Oh. It actually is his pager. Damn.
